Abstrak:
After witnessing the 1945 Trinity atomic-bomb test, the theoretical physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer recalled Hindu scripture: “Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds.” Although this is often interpreted as admitting moral culpability on the part of the Manhattan Project’s scientific director, Oppenheimer
remained a central player in the nuclearweapons establishment until he lost his security clearance in the mid-1950
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
